\>"Welcome to the world of \C[2]Gertena\C[0]"

\n\\>『ようこそ ゲルテナの世界へ』\n\\> 本日はご\\C[2]？？？\.中国(簡体字):
“欢迎来到Guertena的世界”

\n\\>『ようこそ ゲルテナの世界へ』\n\\> 本日はご\\C[2]？？？\.Japanese:
"Welcome to the world of Guertena"
Thank you very much for visiting us today.

\n\\>当館では現在\\C[1]【ワイズ・ゲルテナ展】\\C[0]を\n\\>.English:
\>The museum is currently holding the\C[1] "Wise Guertena" \C[0]exhibition.
exhibition is currently being held at the museum.

\n\\>ゲルテナ氏が生前描いた あやしくも美しい絵画たちを\n\\>どうか心行.English:
\>We would like to invite you to enjoy the beautiful and
\>mysterious paintings i hope you will enjoy them to your heart's content.
